title: Sally Jones & Sidewinder Live
teaser: They may be solidly gone, but they're not forgotten. What a band they were. Some of the best pickers in the business, led by one of the genres finest singers and songwriters. Kristin Scott Benson, Cody Kilby, Mickey Harris, and Sally Jones - Sally Jones and the Sidewinders will be hunkering around the microphones live in a special session captured for the Breakdown in 2001.
